author: amerkay
description: PowerLoop for Farmbot: Loop your farmbot by plants with search filters, or by automatic waypoint calculation to cover Plant search results grid area. Features include executing sequences and saving meta data.

1.name: filter_pointname
1.label: Filter by plant name, case insensitive. 'aru' matches 'Arugula', * for all.

2.name: filter_openfarm_slug
2.label: Filter by Openfarm slug name, case insensitive. 'aru' matches 'Arugula', * for all.

8.name: filter_plant_stage
8.label: Filter by plant stage (Allowed: None, planned, planted, sprouted, harvested). Multiple allowed comma separated.

13.name: sequence_init
13.label: Init Sequences, one-time execution. Eg. 'SeqName1, SeqName2'

14.name: sequence_beforemove
14.label: Sequences Before Next Move, for each plant. Eg. 'SeqName1, SeqName2'

15.name: sequence_aftermove
15.label: Sequences After Move, for each plant. Eg. 'SeqName1, SeqName2'

16.name: sequence_end
16.label: End Sequences, one-time execution. Eg. 'SeqName1, SeqName2'

19.name: save_plant_stage
19.label: Set plant stage (None, planned, planted, sprouted, harvested)

20.name: move_offset_x
20.label: Offset X value when moving - (integer, randint(i,j))

21.name: move_offset_y
21.label: Offset Y value when moving - (integer, randint(i,j))

22.name: move_z
22.label: Default Z axis value when moving

23.name: move_speed
23.label: Default speed value when moving. Percent of max speed (1-100)

24.name: use_simple_sort
24.label: Use simple X, Y sort instead of Travelling Salesman Problem Greedy algorithm to optimize route? If 'False' (default), no quotes, TSP Greedy Algorithm will be used.

25.name: grid_coverage_per_step
25.label: Grid coverage (x, y) per step. None to disable (default), set to enable. E.g camera fov '(220, 310)'. When used, no point data will be saved.

26.name: grid_coverage_offset
26.label: Grid coverage offset (x, y) from center. Default (0,0), set to enable. E.g camera is offset '(50, 100)'.

27.name: grid_coverage_overlap
27.label: Grid coverage overlap. The overlap between coverage-area rectangles. Default 0. Max value 75 (%).

28.name: grid_coverage_summarize
28.label: Grid coverage, summarize steps attempting to cover each Plant once at least. Default: False. If set True, waypoint summary mode with radius coverage will be used.

29.name: debug
29.label: Debug mode (0-> No FW debug msg, 1-> FW debug msg (default), 2-> No move/exec - do save point data, 3-> simulation, log only)
